organises public transport in the area. There are trains or buses from Gothenburg to all the destinations. Change is needed for Svenljunga and Tranemo. 

From the Landvetter airport to Bollebygd, Borås, Mark, Svenljunga, Tranemo, Ulricehamn, a Västtrafik trip might be preferred, usually by bus to Rävlanda and train to Borås, and bus to the destination. These Västtrafik buses go from near the airport hotel, 200 m walk straight away from the airport building. Search the Västtrafik site for connections.

From the airport to Herrljunga and Vårgårda the airport bus to Gothenburg (going directly from the airport building) and Västtrafik train is preferred.

From the Gothenburg City airport, use the airport bus to Gothenburg.

Tickets for Västtrafik can be bought by credit card onboard, but not for buses in Gothenburg. Pressbyrån (e.g. at Landvetter airport) and some other shops sell tickets. The airport bus need special tickets which are bought with credit card onboard. Read the
Inside the municipalities there are buses, all organized by Västtrafik.
